text: Arau yisakale machajida nirmana karaiche ksatisadhana karaara babe, kupharai karaara babe arau muminasakalara majata bibheda srsti karaara uddesye arau iyara agate allaha arau te'omra raachulara biraud'dhe yisakale yud'dha karaichila sihamtara gopana ghamti sbaraupe byaraharara uddesye, arau sihamte arasye sapata kha'i ka’ba, ‘ami kerala kalyana kamana karaichilohe’; arau allahe saksya diye ye, arasye sihamta michaliya
